Summary: slow moving,silent,dark triangle passed over my house, from south to north, it was massive and had lights at the corners.

divs: Sighting Detailsthe date is approximate,this happened right outside my house. i've kind of been in denial about this since i saw it, due to the fact that it had no explanation. that is why i have not come forward until now. two other people also witnessed this with me. we had stepped outside for a cigarette around 11pm. when i looked up and noticed the sky was completely blotted out. as the object passed over us we could see it was triangle shaped. this thing was huge. it seemed to be only 100 feet in the air, moved silently but steadily northward until it was out of our sight,we also noticed it had lights at each corner. i recently became interested when a person described this very same object on a program i happened to be watching. does anyone have any idea what that thing was? if it was military,why haven't we seen it? there certainly would be a use for such technology by now, obviously 9 years ago when i saw this thing it was already perfected.
